name: Cream Cheese Sheet Cake
steps: In a mixing bowl, cream butter, cream cheese and sugar. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Beat in vanilla. Add flour; mix well, Pour into a greased 15 x 10 in x 1 in. baking pan. Bake at 325 for 30-35 min or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.

Cool completely. For frosting, combine sugar and milk in a saucepan; bring to boil over medium heat. Cover and cook for 3 minutes (do not stir). Stir in butter and chocolate chips until melted. Cool slightly. Stir; spread over cake. Yield: 24-30.
